rukus.text: Ananta karunamayudu apara karuna pradata ayina allah peruto
sarvalokalaku prabhuvaina allah matrame samasta stotralaku ar'hudu
memu ninne aradhistunnamu mariyu ni sahayanne arthistunnamu
nivu anugrahincina vari margam matrame (cupu) ni agrahaniki guri ayina vari (margam kani) leka margabhrastulaina vari (margam kani) kadu
